website_summaries.verdict: The Canon PowerShot A3100 IS is a very good simple point-and-shoot, even though it doesn't do much beyond that.
pros: excellent photo quality for its class

customer_reviews.title: Canon Powershot A3100IS Camera...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a replacement for an older version that had some issues. The fact that it runs on Li-Ion batteries is great...better than carrying XX number of rechargeable AA batteries with you everywhere you go. The quality of the pictures is sufficient, but sometimes if the camera's not steady, it could produce a rather blurry picture. However, the majority of my pictures have been clear. I have not sufficiently tested the video feature, but the videos that I did capture were of good quality. A very good choice of camera if you are a fan of Canon cameras. Enjoy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Hoh

customer_reviews.title: Canon PowerShot A3100S Point & Shoot camera
customer_reviews.text: I gave this Canon pocket camera to my wife, and she has used it on several trips to the desert and to other continets. It is tough, easy to use, compact, takes great photos and the battery life is quite good. She is very happy with it. For point& shoot there are several excellent makes of camera, but Canon seems to me to be the best buy. The only problem is obsolescence, all digital cameras become obsolete in a short time and it is impossible to get them repaired. Fortunatley this little Canon is a survivor and still works perfectly. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Anilao diver

customer_reviews.title: OK camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Durability is in question; although Canon is known as a good product. Pictures good, zoom OKimage stabilization has a bit to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: Dredger13

customer_reviews.title: For $97, perfect..
customer_reviews.text: The price reminds me of those old Brownie cameras or throwaways. But the performance is awesome. Works right out of the box and downloads immediately to Apple computer iPhoto. No need to download software, although it is included just in case one needs it. Comes with cables and rechargeable battery. Battery needs to charged for first time before using. Only a photo flash card is missing but most of us have one or two around the house. Yes, there is a lag time between one photo and taking the next picture. There are sophisticated ways for Canon to get around this lag but that raises the price significantly.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Oksol

customer_reviews.title: PowerShot A3100IS is a category killer!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this camera to my 12 year old grandaugter two months ago. Now she goes everywhere with it and refuses to put it down! It takes well-focused, crystal clear pictures, even in basic point-and-shoot mode. The image stabilization is immensely better than on my Panasonic Lumix TZ5, and its ergonomics and image quality are clearly superior to her mother's recently-purchased Nikon point-and-shoot camera in the same price range. Another thing... the video mode is extremely simple to use and works great. Think I'll sell the Lumix and get one of these for myself!
customer_reviews.author: TechWrite

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Very nice and though used still takes good pictures.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Not as fast saving photos as the newer models, but I am very happy with the photo quality, and got the camera in original box with all the extras. This little machine is about the size of a cell phone and is so convenient to pack and take on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: Takes very nice pictures. This camera is small and lightweight. It is perfect for vacations and trips. It can easily be connected to your computer, laptop, etc.. to download photos. It's also very affordable. Pictures are clear and come out great! Makes a great gift. We bought it for our daughter's 13th birthday, and she really liked it. She has made movies on it, and done a variety of things. A good deal overall.
customer_reviews.author: Teachbabs

customer_reviews.title: Very good for a used camera
customer_reviews.text: Very good for a used camera.Easy to use,but didn't come with instructions.I did get them on line.Liked that it came with a camera case.
customer_reviews.author: snowbaby

customer_reviews.title: Another great value from AMAZON!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't owned a Canon before. I have had a Sony for years and loved it, but wanted a new digital with usb port for easier downloading. At first this camera felt rather tinny and cheap compared to my older heavier camera, but the pictures are far clearer, crisper then from my Sony. I have only had it a month, but I think I am going to just love this camera. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon C

customer_reviews.title: Great camera from Canon
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera. It takes really good pictures of high quality even when you zoom in close. I use E-Bay for selling items that need to be viewed up close and very clearly. This camera takes perfect pictures showing details very well with little or no blurriness. All around great camera. It could be just a bit more user friendly. If you haven't taken pictures with it in a while, it's hard to remember how to navigate for viewing and settings, etc. However, I still give it a great review.
customer_reviews.author: roynlori

customer_reviews.title: SLIM camera, great features for a very reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera as it fits in the pocket, has a large display screen, uses a rechargeable battery, and is quick to focus and snap the shot. Very nice quality photos are produced for such a "basic" camera by today's standards, especially for the price!! I highly recommend this camera. It has a lot of options and helpful features in todays world of digital photography!
customer_reviews.author: Gerard Davids

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have not used the camera much since purchase but can agree that the delay time between pix is as noted previously... you can't be a trigger slammer. Will follow up more when I get prints etc. but my sis sez the shots are great. This is a followup to my A590IS (8 mp 4x zoom) so it's an improvement and what's also great - no batteries. The charger/camera is alot lighter to tote around. I loved the good photos that I got with the A590IS so I expect to love even more this newer edition.
customer_reviews.author: denver don

customer_reviews.title: I really like this camera easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera easy to use, just the right size to carry in a purse, and its a Canon wouldn't want any other brand
customer_reviews.author: Mary F. Stitely

customer_reviews.title: We like this camera!
customer_reviews.text: Our other canon quite working, so we looked at newer cameras, but our children really like the pictures we could take before our other camera broke, and I liked being able to toss it in my purse or coat pocket, so we just bought the same camera again. We've had it for four months now, and it is a great camera! Easy to use and it takes clear, crisp pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Pete Miller

customer_reviews.title: Worked good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, after only 1 1/2 years this camera stopped focusing correctly. All regular views and especially zoomed photos are all out of focus although the camera acts like it is focusing. To get it repaired would have cost more than the original price or for a newer, better camera.
customer_reviews.author: Rwater

customer_reviews.title: This camera is great
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes great pictures with great color to them. Very easy to use and even takes good pictures in the dark. So far there isn't anything I don't like about this camera, after all it is a Cannon and they are known for their cameras. Pros: Takes great pictures. Small enough to put in pocket or purse. Has enough options to take all kinds of pictures. Good battery life. Large viewing screen. Very attractive (I have the red) Cons: I can't think of any yet. I would recommend this camera to ant one that wants a small point-&-shoot camera.
customer_reviews.author: C. RICE

customer_reviews.title: works well as expected.
customer_reviews.text: works well as expected. Ordered it 'used' and it came in pristine shape.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Takes great pictures.
customer_reviews.text: I chose this rating because this camera does take great pictures for its size. I wanted a different camera but my choices were limited for the money I wanted to pay. I would like to have had a camera that had a battery that I could charge using solar energy. For the price this is a great little camera.
customer_reviews.author: Margo L Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love my PowerShot
customer_reviews.text: My first Canon PowerShot camera was stolen. It was a present from my daughter. It takes really good pictures. Easy to shoot and develop. I had to replace the camera, tried to use my phone for picture taking but the clarity was just not as good. I am guarding it from theft this time, but I still carry it with me always.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Drew

customer_reviews.title: Its the Software
customer_reviews.text: The camera is easy to use and takes great pictures. The software handling the computer interface is not user friendly and compared to the HP/Kodak system leaves much to be desired. Systems engineers need to filter their products through a consumer use advisor who can change the language to simple and intuitive terms like "download pictures" or "email pictures".
customer_reviews.author: loggiarch

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: The product is amazing. Replaced a 5 year old camera with this one. It was still working but the quality and bulkyness was getting in the way. Having a rechargable battery is the main reason I bought this camera and why red? Because the blue one was 50 dollars more. Crazy huh? Very good camera and I have been enjoying it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando Cerda

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I need a camera to take photos for my website so the zoom and anti-shake abilities are really, really important. This camera does it. I am so impressed by the quality of this camera for the price. Plus it's small enough but not too small and is easy to operate - I didn't really need to read much to get it going. It's also compatible with Windows which is helpful for me and my use.
customer_reviews.author: KDSF

customer_reviews.title: This is the second like this we have had and have enjoyed the first ...
customer_reviews.text: Replacement camera for one that had broken. This is the second like this we have had and have enjoyed the first one very much. This model seems to be even better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera on March (half a year ago) and I love it! The images are awesome thanks to the image stabilizer. I almost have to do nothing with my pictures except editing the light a little bit. The images are always clear and beautiful. But just one thing, I spent only a little bit over $100 on this camera (I got a brand new one) on March, perhaps it was on sale. So if you are debating yourself about the price, wait until spring or thanksgiving. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great first camera!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a Christmas gift for my eight-year-old daughter to replace a low-res, boring, plastic "Barbie" toy camera that produced color smears instead of actual pictures. She is absolutely thrilled with her new "real" camera. The modest additional cost to upgrade from a "toy" to the real thing was definitely worth it. She's learning how to explore all of the functions, and it also has an "Easy" setting for her first attempts. The picture quality is amazing considering the cost of the camera. We are totally, totally satisfied with this purchase. Thank you, Canon!
customer_reviews.author: J. Turcany

customer_reviews.title: Canon PowerShot A3100IS 12.1 MP Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Dependable. Small. Takes great pictures. Easy to use. I would definitely recommend it. It is small, but the red color makes it easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: Gary C. Stoltz

customer_reviews.title: Canon review
customer_reviews.text: It's definately an upgrade from the camera that I was using, in terms of pictures quality, size & weight and menu options. Pros: Better pixel count and the pictures turn out crisp and clear. Nice and small, fit in pocket well and is ready to take pics on the go. Cons: Sometimes it takes too long to focus when trying to take a pic of an active subject, eg. little kids and sporting events.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Guymon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Camera was exactly as pictured and described in the "copy." I gave this to my daughter and she was extremely please with the quality and pictures she has taken. Very good buy and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Professor 39

customer_reviews.title: Superb compact digital camera
customer_reviews.text: Canon have a great reputation compared to sony and panasonic and the Powershot A3100IS 12.1MP camera is a fantastic combination of small size and great optics, with good shooting modes and features. Personally I prefer larger more complex cameras like the Powershot SX10 IS for 'art photography' but for quick shooting on holiday, on the beach, while traveling around the compact A3100 IS is perfect. Images are much better than comparable cameras from Sony and Panasonic.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel West

customer_reviews.title: in like new condition
customer_reviews.text: Camera came as advertised, in like new condition, works perfectly. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: Best choice for my 1st camera!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the first digital camera that I have ever purchased. I did alot of research into it, between reading consumer reports, and customer reviews. For the price range I was looking at this camera was the best overall I came across!! Once I received it I immediately started using it and I haven't put it down since!!..It is soooo easy to use and the picture quality is great!!..I have only used it on the automatic setting and have been so pleased with every picture Ive taken that I havent even tried any of the others yet!!...I love this camera and would definitely recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: eternalmena

customer_reviews.title: Takes great pictures
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera for quite awhile now & I still love it! It is easy to use & still ALWAYS takes great pictures! It has been fun to use!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn High

customer_reviews.title: Canon Power Shot A3100IS
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace a broken Canon camera that had a lot more features. I never used the extra features, so I decided to get a small point and shoot. I took pictures all through Christmas, and almost all of them turned out great. Only a couple were fuzzy and that is because of movement. I haven't tried the video yet. The battery seems to keep a charge for a long time. So far, I am very happy with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: T. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Light and Durable
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera. Perfect for first time digital camera users. Still better quality photos than those taken from a cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: M. Russell

customer_reviews.title: The A3100 es good
customer_reviews.text: This Camera es very good. Very small and is good for manipulate it. The pictures are good. Some times it take it's time between picture to take another picture, but the good thing is the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Randolph Vargas Balbuena

customer_reviews.title: I like this camera
customer_reviews.text: Good compact point and shoot camera. Canon small camera are good. Bought this one long ago for my relative and reviewing now.
customer_reviews.author: S ks

customer_reviews.title: Retired Richard
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera, has a zoom lens for close up shots. I take a photo of the puzzles that my wife and I put together. She likes the date printed on the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Richard

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter's Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: We haven't printed any photos but the photos on the screen are disappointing to me. They are not crisp or bright. Maybe there is something wrong with the camera...or I need to read the instructions... Any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: bestgram3

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: I needed a camera my mother could figure out. This super simple point and shoot has been great for her. I highly recommend it to the technology disadvantaged beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Bou

customer_reviews.title: it's ok
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't recommend it to anyone but it serves the purpose. The pictures aren't always clear no matter how focused the camera is.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used the camera that much but I have found it quite confusing to figure out settings etc. I don't feel you can call this a point and shoot camera. The pictures I have taken appear to have come out decent but for the price you can't complain. It seems to take good pictures, its slow as far as the shutter speed, a little tricky to focus, but again its a Canon and its a good value
customer_reviews.author: janal

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for kids under 10 for their first real cameras. Easy to use, works great, and takes quality pictures. Couldn't ask for a better first camera for young kids.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Trails

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love the canon powershot line - great cameras. The auto features are nice, but I really like that you can choose the settings yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia A Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: I had a camera just like this one and had it stolen , I looked all over for one to replace it, but ended up buying the same one and love it!
customer_reviews.author: vikings

customer_reviews.title: Happiness
customer_reviews.text: Great value and performance. The surface scratches mentioned in the description are minor, at best
customer_reviews.author: Bill Allen

customer_reviews.title: New Canon camera
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very pleased with the quality of pictures and ease of using this camera. Can't beat a Canon for quality photos.
customer_reviews.author: Jollyelf

customer_reviews.title: canon power shot
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, great pictures. I am very happy with this camera. For the price, you can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love my camera where is the battery charger that was supposed to come with it?
customer_reviews.text: Love the camera, takes amazing pictures. Battery died and then I read all the information accompanying the order only to find that it was suppose to have included a battery charger. Now what do I do keep purchasing $40 batteries?
customer_reviews.author: Nancy P

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Thrilled about this product, it came in the shape it was described and works really great! No complaints from this customer.
customer_reviews.author: Jami Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Very cool camera!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. Takes great stills, good video and does it with ease. For the price I paid I feel like I got alot of bang for the buck. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use Camera
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Canon PowerShot camera. It's attractive, just the right size, and so easy to use with the auto adjust.
customer_reviews.author: jdboots

customer_reviews.title: What a lemon!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe that this camera malfunctioned the minute I got it with this "lens error" message. I then contacted the Canon tech support who said it wasn't because of the battery(which I had charged fully the day before)or the memory card. Instead it could've been due to a number of faulty things(lens stuck since it wasn't opening as it should). I had more luck with the 2.2 megapixel model I bought ten years ago! So instead of sending the camera directly to Canon to have it repaired or replaced, I've opted to return to the vendor and get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S. Mandell

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Camera
customer_reviews.text: Compact, pretty camera. It takes very good photos. I am satisfied with the cameraand with Amazon's service. The attention was excellent and the purchase was delivered in the promised space.
customer_reviews.author: Marhelena

customer_reviews.title: Overall comments
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera, very easy to work and play around with it. Thought my order was supposed to come with a 2Mhg card, but it did not come with the camera. It needs a case due to the large LCD screen, or a way to cover it. Had to go out and buy a case right away to prevent any damage to screen. Love the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Consider how much these type cameras use to cost, it's a bargain. A little too slow for my wife. She wants something real fast; not that the camera is slow. It's not. That's a price premium that I don't want to pay. Overall, a very good bargain camera.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L. Magro

customer_reviews.title: best for price
customer_reviews.text: The Canon Powershot A3100 is the best camera for the price I know. In fact its features like the dial on top make for easy changes in the options. I have used this camera for more than a year, and I have given one to each of my kids as well. The quality of images outperforms more recent Canon cameras in this series and the elph line.
customer_reviews.author: Abuelito Patricio

customer_reviews.title: great pocket camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes great pictures! We bought it for our 5 1/2 year old daughter (she is able to operate it easily), but since that time, our digital SLR camera has been in the shop for repairs so we've been using it quite a bit. It is a little slow between pictures, but the image quality is good. We have had it about a month and are happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Canon Camera
customer_reviews.text: My wife swears by this product, stating that it is the greatest camera she has ever owned. Besides the quality of the pictures, the ease and simplicity of usage seems to have great appeal. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: John O. Brown, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great simple camera
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised at the quality of pictures from this simple, aim and shoot camera. I use this camera when a larger one is to bulky to carry like on hikes or on trips.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Duso

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: It looks just what I need and I give it 5 stars on the assumption that it will provide long life, as with my previous purchases of Canon products.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony B Crease

customer_reviews.title: The camera arrived on time,and it looks brand new. I look forward to using it in the future. I couldnt find it in my local store
customer_reviews.text: The camera arrived on time,and it looks brand new. I look forward to using it in the future. I couldnt find it in my local stores . So I was thrilled to find it at amazon.com!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Merry Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Fine camera that has taken great pictures
customer_reviews.text: Finally, updated to digital after decades of 35mm and this digital is working out fine. I have consistently taken fine quality photos just using the "automatic" setting. Fine camera for the price.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera for my mom. It is an upgrade to the one I have (A200IS). She loves it as much as I love mine. The difference is the price. Hers was $100 less than mine on black friday. A great camera for someone who just wants to aim, shoot and have a great picture taken.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Canon Powershot A3100lS is an All around great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use Takes nice pictures Rechargeable battery-good battery life Nice size camera Use this Brand camera for 5 years now
customer_reviews.author: therichards06

customer_reviews.title: great pics
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes great photos and is super portable. Use the hand strap,my wife dropped it quite often because she didn't use the strap.
customer_reviews.author: James McErlain

customer_reviews.title: Canon Power Shot A3100IS
customer_reviews.text: This Canon Power Shot is easy to use. It downloads to the laptop very easy and puts pics where you can find them. Small, compact, and lightweight, it is a winner. High Recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy W. Marcoulier

customer_reviews.title: Easy-Peasy
customer_reviews.text: This little camera is easy to carry, easy to use and the pictures are great. The instruction manual is clear and shows you as well as tells you how to do everything. I use it in my preschool classroom and I've had some great shots. The only negative about this camera is that it does not come with a photo card. I had to go out and purchase one which is silly when ordering a camera by mail. I am sure most people would prefer to pay a few dollars more and be ready to shoot when the camera arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Claire R.H.

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: It feels a little less solid than the more expensive cameras, but the guts seems about the same and it works fine. Seems to be about the best value for the price out there.
customer_reviews.author: LonJ

customer_reviews.title: Canon PowerShot A3100IS 12.1 MP Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: For a small digital camera to easily carry on vacation, etc, very good for the price. Takes pictures almost as good as my $400 camera.
customer_reviews.author: dilightful

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Takes great clear pictures, many options on it for the price.Very easy to use for beginners, fits in purse or pocket nicely.
customer_reviews.author: MARLYS DAHLKE

customer_reviews.title: I used to be a photographer
customer_reviews.text: You know, darkroom, dodging prints, all that. I have five good to excellent film cameras. I never thought I'd descend to using a point-and-shoot, but film is all but dead and the darkroom has gone dark. So now I have this electronic toy. And damned if it doesn't take good pictures, pretty much all by itself! If you have to be dragged into the 21st Century, you might as well go with this well-made, tiny, good-at-taking pictures Canon.
customer_reviews.author: hombre viejo

customer_reviews.title: Great digital camera for the beginner!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed in the color of my choice. I was able to try a friend's camera (same model) out for a month prior to my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Vanita Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera in general.
customer_reviews.text: If you need an easy to use camera for basic picture taking this is a great camera. For more advaned users the long cycle between shots may be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Korsu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift for a relative. The camera is very nice and its size and weight are ideal to carry with you all the time.
customer_reviews.author: lzuniga

customer_reviews.title: Happy at First ... Now Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this camera for less than a year. I loved it for the first six months, then it started having issues. About a month ago, it started shutting itself off and stating there was an E32. Turns out I have to return the camera to the company for repair. I think a camera should last more than a few months before it has problems.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Great camera. Great picture for this great price. Cam is slim and portable. Picture quality is really equivalent to professional DSLR camera.
customer_reviews.author: Ashok

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent camera, price to value to features all figured in and will be used a lot around church events.
customer_reviews.author: James Hugh Drury

customer_reviews.title: CANON POWERSHOT A3100IS
customer_reviews.text: I JUST LOVE THIS CAMERA!IT HAS A VARIETY OF FEATURES AND TAKES BEAUTIFUL PICTURES!I'VE GOTTEN SO MANY COMPLIMENTS ON IT,THROUGH TRIAL AND ERROR I'M FINALLY MASTERING IT,AND THE MANUAL OF COURSE IS VERY HELPFUL.I PURCHASED THE SILVER COLOR,WHICH IS STANDARD,I WISH THEY WOULD HAVE HAD THE BLUE AVAILABLE WHEN I FIRST ORDERED.ANYWHOSE HIGHLY RECOMMENED,AND THE CARRYING CASE IS A MUST.ALSO THE RECHARGEABLE BATTERY IS HOT,SAVES ON REPLACEMENTS.
customer_reviews.author: RACHEAL

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfactory!  Very good pictures!
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well from the start! many options and choices to make! Pix have been very good to excellent!! Very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: great cannon powershot 12.1 mp digital camera
customer_reviews.text: works really welll. very crisp and clear pictures. even when i zoom, the pictures say nice anc clear
customer_reviews.author: Anita Curry

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera for beginner
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this camera for our granddaughter. It is her first camera and so far has been easy to operate with good quality pictures. Since it has only been used a few weeks, we cannot give a detailed review at this time.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: i love this camera! It is so easy to use and takes great quality pictures! I would recommend it to anyone! :)
customer_reviews.author: AmyLynn

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted a small camera less than 100 bucks which givs good quality pictures in addition to my bulky SLR. This is a Very good buy and recommended for others.Just remember to keep the AutoSettings in place.always
customer_reviews.author: Gaurav Bhatnagar

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera.
customer_reviews.text: Good camera for the price we paid (149). Boots up fast and take much better pictures than our old camera. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave up a Canon Coolpix 5700 for this little camera and I love it. As much as I loved my Coolpix, it was just too outdated for my use and I just couldn't afford a new one. This little camera does everything that one did and more! Easy to use and very compact. Just throw it in your purse or bag and go!!
customer_reviews.author: pmelendez

customer_reviews.title: Review of canon powershot A3100IS
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I have used this product and found it to be very good. The photos are of very good quality and the camera itself is quite light and compact enough to carry around. I would like to recommend this product to anybody who is looking for a decent entry level digital camera.
customer_reviews.author: vishwanath

customer_reviews.title: Caonon powershot A3100IS
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a Canon powershot A3100IS camera, I like the camera, only think I don't care for is the set up for the buttons on top, you have to use the middle button the take the picture, just have to get use to it, my old camera A1000IS, had the picture button on the end. It is light and takes very good pictures, and well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Kriz

customer_reviews.title: Good pictures but not great feel
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This is not the expensive model by Canon. It takes great pictures but the handling is not that great. I am a Canon fan and have used Canon Ixus and EOS Rebel SLR before. Pros: The quality of pictures is really good. Face detection works. Inexpensive. Good starting camera with easy to use menu and features. Cons: Cheap feel. Feels like the menu button are made of cheap plastic or fiber.
customer_reviews.author: hemya

customer_reviews.title: Canon
customer_reviews.text: The shutter activation button was way too small and not distinct enough to press without fumbling around. Form following function was certainly not followed here. Otherwise, the camera is of suitable quality.
customer_reviews.author: Prairie Folk

customer_reviews.title: Great Little basic camera
customer_reviews.text: Got this camera for my mom for Christmas. Perfect easy to use basic camera at a great price. She loved it and found it easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: W. Felsinger

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: It's a great first camera for my young son. He likes it. The picture quality is good and it is simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: sydney

customer_reviews.title: Very good camera
customer_reviews.text: this is my first camera than i buy and it is awesome take very nice pictures , it have many features and it is very easy to use, i recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Alejandro Avila Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my daughter in August,her birthday. She is a techie person and loved it from the get go. She's not much on taking pictures, however, this little camera has changed that. She likes the fact that it is small enough to fit in her purse and she's learned to take it everywhere she goes. The ease and performance are awesome. Cannon has done it again. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Highwaymom

customer_reviews.title: Bad picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Very bad picture quality. Even holding the camera with super steady hands the picture comes out blurry. You can see all the little pixels in your pictures. I bought this camera after hearing all the bad reviews of the nikon coolpix cameras and boy was i wrong. My friend just purchased a nikon and it excels better than this canon camera in every way. Only good thing about this camera is its handy and light. But i would avoid buying this camera if your looking for good quality pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Codyy

customer_reviews.title: he biggest problem I have w/it is the lack of ...
customer_reviews.text: The biggest problem I have w/it is the lack of the 'eye lens' to look through to get a gander of what pic you are getting!
customer_reviews.author: Harry C.

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: All I needed was an excuse to upgrade from a Canon IXY 800IS. It came when my wife accidentally drown my little Canon. The 3100IS is an upgrade at a very reasonable price. Pros: Fast start up and shut-down Comes in various colors larger screen but still fits in pocket excellent movie quality picture quality you expect from a bigger camera Cons: no viewfinder at this price point the battery/SD card lid seems a bit flimsy. PS. keep it out of salt water
customer_reviews.author: Radbadad

customer_reviews.title: broken
customer_reviews.text: This item did not work after charging the battery. Called and was told it was defective and was asked to return it.
customer_reviews.author: el

customer_reviews.title: Sensational and perpetual!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was really great!!!!! The one main advantage about this type of camera was that I didn't have to use disposable batteries and constantly put new ones! All I had to do was charge it up if the battery ever goes dead. I didn't really use it yet, but I'm very excited to actually start using it when I have the chance;-)
customer_reviews.author: Samuel S. Chan

customer_reviews.title: Very blurry.
customer_reviews.text: This type of Canon camera does not work as well as my previous one. I am very dissapointed with the pictures it takes. Everything comes out so blurry. The only way I can get it to take any decent pictures at all is to have it on the kids and pets setting. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: kcbk

product_meta.title: Canon PowerShot A3100IS 12.1 MP Digital Camera with 4x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 2.7-Inch LCD (Red)
product_meta.description:
Color:RedFROM THE MANUFACTURER


 There's nothing more satisfying than taking great pictures! And with the Canon PowerShot A3100 IS, it's so effortless. The 12.1-megapixel resolution and 4x optical zoom with Optical Image Stabilizer ensure radiant, detailed images. Plus, you've got an advanced DIGIC III Image Processor with evolved Face Detection Technology and the Face Detection Self-timer for extraordinary control and performance. New scene modes give your images a professional feel. There's the Face Detection Self-timer for extraordinary control and performance and Smart AUTO lets you handle challenging conditions with ease. Plus this trim, fashionable camera is yours in three stunning colors. 



12.1-megapixel resolution Canon PowerShot A3100 IS Highlights


Powerful A-Series camera with 12.1 megapixels, 4x optical zoom with Optical Image Stabilizer and DIGIC III Image Processor
With the PowerShot A3100 IS, dramatic, personal pictures have never been easier to shoot and share. This 12.1-megapixel camera lets you create impressive large photos of family and friends you'll be proud to display. The high-resolution 4000 x 3000-pixel images taken by the PowerShot A3100 IS can be enlarged up to 13 x 19 inches. 

The PowerShot A3100 IS has a 4x optical zoom lens that makes it easy to get the inspiring, emotive close-ups that will make your images lasting keepsakes. This magnificent lens gives you the power to shoot subjects with razor-sharp precision and stunning lifelike color. So you can brilliantly capture a shot of a sweeping landscape, or a child's big smile. 

The PowerShot A3100 IS is equipped with Canon's acclaimed Optical Image Stabilizer Technology that automatically detects and corrects camera shake--one of the leading causes of fuzzy or blurred shots. Even when zoomed in, you can get the steady, crisp, brilliant images you'll be proud to shoot and share. And Canon's Optical Image Stabilizer Technology is so convenient to use. It functions perfectly with or without a flash. 

Lithium-ion battery
The Canon PowerShot A3100 IS uses a newly developed rechargeable lithium-ion battery. This compact, powerful battery helps make it an incredibly lightweight and slim camera. Charge-up is quick and easy, so the PowerShot A3100 IS will be ready and waiting for those special moments. 

New Scene Modes deliver more creative freedom
The Canon PowerShot A3100 IS gives you even more creative freedom by including new modes made to get the kind of images people talk about. Super Vivid captures the colors you see with your mind's eye, saturating the scene with intense colors. Turn drab scenes into exciting compositions, when dull pinks blaze into brilliant fuchsia and off-yellows suddenly burn bright and hot. Even dark colors become richer with Super Vivid. Sunsets and floral scenes turn into bursts of color, and get your photo noticed. 

Poster Effect combines several similar shades into one color, turning subtle gradations of color into eye-catching, scene-popping contrasts across your image for a unique artistic look. 

18 Shooting Modes 
Advanced presets for the best possible photos under certain conditions. With 18 Shooting Modes including Scene Modes, you're ready for whatever shot comes your way. 

Smart AUTO will do the work for you by intelligently selecting the proper settings
Just set the Canon PowerShot A3100 IS to Smart AUTO and you're ready for maximum enjoyment from your picture taking every time. It's a relaxing and satisfying way to shoot because you can completely concentrate on your subject knowing that the camera has the technical details covered. Advanced Canon technology intelligently analyzes your situation and shooting conditions. Then it automatically selects an appropriate setting from 18 specially defined settings. So whether you're photographing flowers, a captivating sunset, or your friends at the park, you can be confident that you're getting dramatic, memorable images. Low Light mode in action 

Low Light mode for improved shooting in dim lighting
With an ISO of 400-3200, the Low Light mode takes the Canon PowerShot A3100 IS where no A-Series has gone before--into the shadows! Now even scenes notorious for having insufficient light, such as those lit by candles, fire, or street lamp, come through in fantastic color and clarity, with less noise. You can keep the feel of the scene intact without adding additional light, so the result will be scenes with the visual accuracy, depth and clarity you expect from a Canon camera. 

Large, bright 2.7-inch LCD
The PowerShot A3100 IS's large 2.7-inch LCD screen gives you the big picture, whether you're shooting, reviewing or showing off your images. This high-resolution screen offers a crisp, clear and bright picture. It also features Night Display for easy viewing in low light.
feature_bullets: 12.1 megapixels, 4x optical zoom with Optical Image Stabilizer, and DIGIC III Image Processor
Lithium-ion battery makes the camera lighter and offers an easy alternative to recharge
New scene modes, including Super Vivid and Poster Effect; Smart Auto selects from 18 predefined shooting situations
Capture images to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars186 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
